title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Meet the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat — a comfortable, easy-to-use mat for gentle exercise at home or in class.

What it is:
- A soft, cushioned exercise mat that helps protect your knees, hips, and back.
- Size: 72 inches long, 24 inches wide. Thick cushion: about 2/5 of an inch.
- Lightweight: about 3 pounds. Color: teal (a calm blue-green).

Why you’ll like it:
- Extra thick and soft: kinder on joints for yoga, Pilates, stretching, or simple floor exercises.
- Easy to carry: comes with a simple strap you can slip around the rolled mat. No fuss.
- Comfortable and secure: the NBR foam feels soft yet supportive.

Good for:
- Gentle stretching each morning.
- Balance and breathing exercises.
- Seated or lying exercises recommended by your doctor or therapist.
- Classes or at-home routines.

Simple tips:
- Unroll the mat on a flat surface.
- Stand or sit in the center for best balance.
- Wipe with a damp cloth to clean. Let it air dry.
- Use the strap to roll it up and carry it.

If you want a mat that’s soft, stable, and easy to manage, this Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat makes movement feel safer and more comfortable, so you can focus on feeling good.
